keyMoments.title: Decides to Target Crocodile Directly
keyMoments.description: Vivi tearfully changes the plan from stopping the rebellion to going directly after Crocodile in Rainbase, recognizing this as the only way to save her kingdom.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Vivi's strategic growth and her willingness to take decisive action even when emotional. This decision drives the entire episode's plot.
keyMoments.quote: We have to get to Crocodile before the rebels invade Alubarna!

keyMoments.title: Reveals Map of Alabasta
keyMoments.description: Vivi shows the crew a detailed map explaining the positions of Alubarna, Katorea, and Rainbase, establishing the strategic situation.
keyMoments.significance: Provides crucial geographical and tactical information that frames the urgency of their mission.

keyMoments.title: Refuses to Share Toto's Water
keyMoments.description: Luffy refuses Usopp's request for water, explaining that old man Toto had to dig all night to fill the container.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's respect for Toto's sacrifice and his understanding of the water crisis in Alabasta, showing character depth beyond his usual carefree nature.
keyMoments.quote: No way! The old man had to dig all night to fill this!

keyMoments.title: Accidentally Sits Next to Smoker
keyMoments.description: Luffy and Usopp loudly enter a bar and inadvertently sit right beside Smoker and Tashigi, leading to a tense encounter.
keyMoments.significance: Luffy's inability to stay low-key ruins the crew's stealth plan and accelerates the confrontation timeline.

name.japanese: ネフェルタリ・コブラ

keyMoments.title: Receives Vivi's Letter About Crocodile
keyMoments.description: King Cobra reads the letter delivered by Karoo revealing that Crocodile is the mastermind behind Alabasta's troubles.
keyMoments.significance: This is the pivotal moment when the kingdom's leadership learns the truth, transforming the conflict from civil war to a unified stand against Crocodile.
keyMoments.quote: Crocodile is without a doubt the person who is trying to destroy Alabasta Kingdom!

keyMoments.title: Orders Attack on Rainbase
keyMoments.description: Upon learning Crocodile's treachery, Cobra immediately orders his forces to march on Rainbase to confront the Warlord.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Cobra's decisive leadership and willingness to confront even a Warlord of the Sea to protect his kingdom.

reveals.information: Learns that Crocodile is the mastermind behind Alabasta's crisis

keyMoments.title: Prepares War Council for Attack
keyMoments.description: As one of Alabasta's two strongest warriors, Chaka begins preparing the war council for the attack on Rainbase.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Chaka's role as a strategic military leader and protector of the kingdom.

keyMoments.title: Volunteers for Reconnaissance Mission
keyMoments.description: As one of Alabasta's two strongest warriors, Pell volunteers to scout ahead and conduct reconnaissance on Rainbase.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Pell's role as a strategic scout and his dedication to protecting the kingdom.

keyMoments.title: Encounters Luffy in Rainbase Bar
keyMoments.description: Smoker is in a Rainbase bar investigating Crocodile when Luffy and Usopp inadvertently sit next to him.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals that the Marines are independently investigating Crocodile's suspicious activities, adding another faction to the conflict.

keyMoments.title: Chases Straw Hats Through Rainbase
keyMoments.description: Smoker pursues the Straw Hats through the streets of Rainbase after recognizing them in the bar.
keyMoments.significance: Creates additional pressure on the Straw Hats and complicates their mission to reach Crocodile.

reveals.information: Is in Rainbase investigating Crocodile independently

keyMoments.title: Encounters Straw Hats in Rainbase
keyMoments.description: Tashigi is with Smoker in a Rainbase bar when they encounter Luffy and Usopp.
keyMoments.significance: Tashigi's presence with Smoker confirms the Marines' investigation into Crocodile.

keyMoments.title: Prepares to Welcome the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Informed of the Straw Hats' arrival in Rainbase, Crocodile is pleased rather than concerned and plans to give them a 'warm welcome.'
keyMoments.significance: Reveals that the Straw Hats have walked into a trap and demonstrates Crocodile's strategic superiority and confidence.
keyMoments.quote: Let's give them a warm welcome.

reveals.information: Has anticipated the Straw Hats' arrival and prepared a trap at Rain Dinners

keyMoments.title: Assists in Preparing the Trap
keyMoments.description: As Miss All Sunday, Robin is with Crocodile when they are informed of the Straw Hats' arrival and helps prepare the trap.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Robin's role as Crocodile's right hand and vice president of Baroque Works at this point in the story.
